about_the_game:
This DLC does not modify gameplay or your in game gallery progress. After purchase the art collection can be found inside your game's install folder and can be viewed with any image viewer. Instructions are provided below.

This DLC provides you with 240 pieces of artwork from the game in JPG or PNG format for easy viewing.

This includes:
  • Hentai scenes of Sandy, Phoenix, Zoe and Mia
  • Pinup galleries of Manae, Holli and Suzi
  • Black Jack Artwork (Tables and Cards)
  • And more!

If you have not completed the game it will contain spoilers.

How to Access the DLC

  • Right Click on the game in your Steam library

  • Select Properties


  • Click Browse


  • Open the DLC folder


  • Success!



All characters are over 18 years of age.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains nudity and explicit uncensored sexual content.
